Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10800. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality solution at a competitive rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can make this product work for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
